event: kidney dialysis for ten years' duration
X-ray abdominal exam showed small bowel dilation
enhanced CT scan revealed multiple hepatic cysts
communication between heterogeneous cyst in left kidney and pericolic space
soft tissue thickening in the left mesocolon
150 ml purulent collection from ruptured cyst of giant polycystic left kidney
bacteriol analysis of the collection isolated Escherichia coli
did not improve with intensive medical support
